about_the_game:
BrickRobo Shop Simulator allows you to take charge of your own brick store, managing inventory, setting prices, and serving customers to grow your business. Sell a variety of bricks and use collected bricks to customize and strengthen your BrickRobos. The stronger your robots, the more valuable they become!

Stock your store with various bricks and adjust pricing to attract customers while maximizing earnings. Keep shelves filled with in-demand bricks, experiment with pricing strategies, and optimize your sales to grow your business. A well-managed store leads to higher profits and better opportunities!

Unlock Brick Packs to obtain a set of bricks in a specific size category, each pack containing multiple shapes but all in the same color. Carefully manage your packs to collect the right bricks needed for your BrickRobo customizations.

Collect bricks and assemble your BrickRobo in the workshop. Experiment with different parts, adjust the design, and create a robot that suits your style.

After customizing your BrickRobo, take it around the city and meet trainers eager for a challenge. Engage in strategic duels where your robot’s design and upgrades determine the outcome. Win battles to earn valuable rewards and refine your BrickRobo into an even stronger competitor.

BrickRobo Shop Simulator offers a unique blend of business management and creative robot customization, making it the perfect experience for brick and robot enthusiasts alike. Start your journey today and build the ultimate store for BrickRobo fans!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 / Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 / Intel Core i7 7700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Manage your own brick store and stock up on essential bricks. Enhance your robot's power with the bricks you collect through boxes or battles against other trainers. Become a skilled entrepreneur and the best trainer in town!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
